Nibiru is really a Sumerian God akin to Zeus of that Greeks. He also stated that it Nibiru and Tiamat collided with each other creating the asteroid belt and therefore the minor planets which include Earth. He also explained that Nibiru would pass away our Solar Method every 3600 years & it is inhabited by a "Annunakis" or "Nephilim" through the Christians.

;
